argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opprnzr.1 | |- O = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nzrring | |- ( R e. NzRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_opprring | |- ( R e. Ring -> O e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. NzRing -> O e. Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_isnzr2 | |- ( R e. NzRing <-> ( R e. Ring /\ 2o ~<_ ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprbi | |- ( R e. NzRing -> 2o ~<_ ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 5 | #P_opprbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` O ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_isnzr2 | |- ( O e. NzRing <-> ( O e. Ring /\ 2o ~<_ ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 7, 9 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. NzRing -> O e. NzRing ) |
